Class AbstractSimpleStandardXVisualization

java.lang.Object
  com.xtructure.xutil.id.AbstractXIdObject
      com.xtructure.xsim.impl.AbstractStandardXComponent
          com.xtructure.xsim.impl.AbstractSimpleStandardXComponent
              com.xtructure.xsim.gui.impl.AbstractSimpleStandardXVisualization
All Implemented Interfaces:
XVisualization<StandardXClock.StandardTimePhase>, XComponent<StandardXClock.StandardTimePhase>, XIdObject, java.lang.Comparable<XIdObject>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComponentGridVisualization, LinkVisualization, LinkVisualization, NodeVisualization, NodeVisualization, OneDCritterViz, WorldCalculationsVisualization, WorldVisualization
public abstract class AbstractSimpleStandardXVisualization
extends AbstractSimpleStandardXComponent
implements XVisualization<StandardXClock.StandardTimePhase>

A base class for visualizations that use a StandardXClock and process only one update per target.

Version:
0.9.6
Author:
Peter Nürnberg

prepare

protected void prepare()
A processing hook for AbstractStandardXComponent.update(XTime) in the StandardXClock.StandardTimePhase.PREPARE phase.

By default, does, but may be overriden by specializations. Overrides AbstractStandardXComponent.prepare(), which gets foreign data.

Overrides:
prepare in class AbstractStandardXComponent

update

protected void update()
A processing hook for AbstractStandardXComponent.update(XTime) in the StandardXClock.StandardTimePhase.UPDATE phase.

By default, does nothing, but may be overriden by specializations. Overrides AbstractSimpleStandardXComponent.update(), which informs targets.

Overrides:
update in class AbstractSimpleStandardXComponent

cleanUpBeforeHook

protected void cleanUpBeforeHook()
A pre-processing hook for cleanUp().

By default, retrieves foreign data, but may be overriden by specializations.

Overrides:
cleanUpBeforeHook in class AbstractStandardXComponent

cleanUp

protected void cleanUp()
A processing hook for AbstractStandardXComponent.update(XTime) in the StandardXClock.StandardTimePhase.CLEAN_UP phase.

This method calls AbstractSimpleStandardXComponent.setData(XId, Object) on every target for which data was received, and optinally calls AbstractSimpleStandardXComponent.blankTarget(XId) for every target for which no data was received.

Overrides:
cleanUp in class AbstractStandardXComponent
